00059 #include <stdio.h>
00060 #include "midas.h"
00061 #include "mcstd.h"
00062 
00063 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00064 
00065 /*
00066   Base address of PC card. Must match jumper setting:
00067   ===================================================
00068 */
00069 
00070 #define CAMAC_BASE 0x280
00071 #define WH   CAMAC_BASE + 0
00072 #define WM   CAMAC_BASE + 1
00073 #define WL   CAMAC_BASE + 2
00074 #define ADD  CAMAC_BASE + 3
00075 #define FUN  CAMAC_BASE + 4
00076 #define STA  CAMAC_BASE + 5
00077 #define ZCI  CAMAC_BASE + 6
00078 #define CACY CAMAC_BASE + 7
00079 #define LXQ  CAMAC_BASE + 8
00080 #define RH   CAMAC_BASE + 9
00081 #define RM   CAMAC_BASE + 10
00082 #define RL   CAMAC_BASE + 11
00083 #define OPST CAMAC_BASE + 12
00084 #define CDMA CAMAC_BASE + 15
00085 
00086 /*
00087   Interrupt request selection. Must match jumper setting:
00088   =======================================================
00089 
00090 Switch IRQ2-7
00091 */
00092 
00093 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00094 #if defined( __MSDOS__ )
00095 #include <dos.h>
00096 #define OUTP(_p, _d) outportb(_p, _d)
00097 #define OUTPW(_p, _d) outport(_p, _d)
00098 #define INP(_p) inportb(_p)
00099 #define INPW(_p) inport(_p)
00100 #elif defined( _MSC_VER )
00101 #include <windows.h>
00102 #include <conio.h>
00103 #define OUTP(_p, _d) _outp((unsigned short) (_p), (int) (_d))
00104 #define OUTPW(_p, _d) _outpw((unsigned short) (_p), (unsigned short) (_d))
00105 #define INP(_p) _inp((unsigned short) (_p))
00106 #define INPW(_p) _inpw((unsigned short) (_p))
00107 #elif defined(OS_LINUX)
00108 #include <asm/io.h>
00109 #include <unistd.h>
00110 #define OUTP(_p, _d) outb(_d, _p)
00111 #define OUTPW(_p, _d) outw(_d, _p)
00112 #define INP(_p) inb(_p)
00113 #define INPW(_p) inw(_p)
00114 #endif
00115 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00116 INLINE void cam8i(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, unsigned char *d)
00117 {
00118 }
00119 
00120 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00121 INLINE void cami(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, WORD * d)
00122 {
00123    WORD loop = 1000;
00124 
00125    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00126    OUTP(STA, n);
00127    OUTP(ADD, a);
00128    OUTP(FUN, f);
00129    OUTP(CACY, 1);
00130    while (((INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7) != 5) && loop > 0)
00131       loop--;
00132    if (loop == 0)
00133       printf("cami: status:0x%x\n", (INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7));
00134    *((char *) d) = (unsigned char) INP(RL);
00135    *((char *) d + 1) = (unsigned char) INP(RM);
00136 }
00137 
00138 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00139 INLINE void cam16i(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, WORD * d)
00140 {
00141    cami(c, n, a, f, d);
00142 }
00143 
00144 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00145 INLINE void cam24i(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, DWORD * d)
00146 {
00147    WORD loop = 1000;
00148 
00149    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00150    OUTP(STA, n);
00151    OUTP(ADD, a);
00152    OUTP(FUN, f);
00153    OUTP(CACY, 1);
00154    while (((INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7) != 5) && loop > 0)
00155       loop--;
00156    if (loop == 0)
00157       printf("cami: status:0x%x\n", (INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7));
00158    *((char *) d) = (unsigned char) INP(RL);
00159    *((char *) d + 1) = (unsigned char) INP(RM);
00160    *((char *) d + 2) = (unsigned char) INP(RH);
00161    *((char *) d + 3) = 0;
00162 }

00166                     unsigned char *d, int *x, int *q)
00167 {
00168 }

00170 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00171 INLINE void cam16i_q(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00172                      WORD * d, int *x, int *q)
00173 {
00174    WORD loop = 1000;
00175 
00176    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00177    OUTP(STA, n);
00178    OUTP(ADD, a);
00179    OUTP(FUN, f);
00180    OUTP(CACY, 1);
00181    while (((INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7) != 5) && loop > 0)
00182       loop--;
00183    if (loop == 0)
00184       printf("cami: status:0x%x\n", (INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7));
00185    *((char *) d) = (unsigned char) INP(RL);
00186    *((char *) d + 1) = (unsigned char) INP(RM);
00187    *q = INP(LXQ);
00188    *x = *q >> 1 & 1;
00189    *q &= 1;
00190 }
00191 
00192 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00193 INLINE void cam24i_q(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00194                      DWORD * d, int *x, int *q)
00195 {
00196    WORD loop = 1000;
00197 
00198    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00199    OUTP(STA, n);
00200    OUTP(ADD, a);
00201    OUTP(FUN, f);
00202    OUTP(CACY, 1);
00203    while (((INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7) != 5) && loop > 0)
00204       loop--;
00205    if (loop == 0)
00206       printf("cami: status:0x%x\n", (INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7));
00207    *((char *) d) = (unsigned char) INP(RL);
00208    *((char *) d + 1) = (unsigned char) INP(RM);
00209    *((char *) d + 2) = (unsigned char) INP(RH);
00210    *((char *) d + 3) = 0;
00211    *q = INP(LXQ);
00212    *x = *q >> 1 & 1;
00213    *q &= 1;
00214 }
00215 
00216 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00217 INLINE void cam16i_r(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00218                      WORD ** d, const int r)
00219 {
00220    WORD i, loop;
00221 
00222    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00223    OUTP(STA, n);
00224    OUTP(ADD, a);
00225    OUTP(FUN, f);
00226    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00227       OUTP(CACY, 1);
00228       loop = 1000;
00229       while (((INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7) != 5) && loop > 0)
00230          loop--;
00231       if (loop == 0) {
00232          printf("cam16i_r: status:0x%x\n", (INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7));
00233          return;
00234       }
00235       *((char *) (*d)) = (unsigned char) INP(RL);
00236       *((char *) (*d) + 1) = (unsigned char) INP(RM);
00237       (*d)++;
00238    }
00239 }
00240 
00241 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00242 INLINE void cam24i_r(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00243                      DWORD ** d, const int r)
00244 {
00245    WORD i, loop;
00246 
00247    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00248    OUTP(STA, n);
00249    OUTP(ADD, a);
00250    OUTP(FUN, f);
00251    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00252       OUTP(CACY, 1);
00253       loop = 1000;
00254       while (((INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7) != 5) && loop > 0)
00255          loop--;
00256       if (loop == 0) {
00257          printf("cam24i_r: status:0x%x\n", (INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7));
00258          return;
00259       }
00260       *((char *) (*d)) = (unsigned char) INP(RL);
00261       *((char *) (*d) + 1) = (unsigned char) INP(RM);
00262       *((char *) (*d) + 2) = (unsigned char) INP(RH);
00263       *((char *) (*d) + 3) = 0;
00264       (*d)++;
00265    }
00266 }

00268 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00269 INLINE void cam16i_rq(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00270                       WORD ** d, const int r)
00271 {
00272    int i, x, q;
00273 
00274    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00275       cam16i_q(c, n, a, f, (*d)++, &x, &q);
00276       if (!q) {
00277          (*d)--;
00278          break;
00279       }
00280    }
00281 }
00282 
00283 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00284 INLINE void cam24i_rq(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00285                       DWORD ** d, const int r)
00286 {
00287    int i, x, q;
00288 
00289    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00290       cam24i_q(c, n, a, f, (*d)++, &x, &q);
00291       if (!q)
00292          break;
00293    }
00294 }

00296 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00297 INLINE void cam16i_sa(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00298                       WORD ** d, const int r)
00299 {
00300    int i, aa, loop;
00301 
00302    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00303    OUTP(STA, n);
00304    OUTP(FUN, f);
00305    aa = a;
00306    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00307       OUTP(ADD, aa);
00308       OUTP(CACY, 1);
00309       loop = 10;
00310       while (((INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7) != 5) && loop > 0)
00311          loop--;
00312       if (loop == 0) {
00313          printf("cam16i_sa: status:0x%x\n", (INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7));
00314          return;
00315       }
00316       *((char *) (*d)) = (unsigned char) INP(RL);
00317       *((char *) (*d) + 1) = (unsigned char) INP(RM);
00318       (*d)++;
00319       aa++;
00320    }
00321 }
00322 
00323 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00324 INLINE void cam24i_sa(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00325                       DWORD ** d, const int r)
00326 {
00327    int i, aa, loop;
00328 
00329    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00330    OUTP(STA, n);
00331    OUTP(FUN, f);
00332    aa = a;
00333    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00334       OUTP(ADD, aa);
00335       OUTP(CACY, 1);
00336       loop = 1000;
00337       while (((INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7) != 5) && loop > 0)
00338          loop--;
00339       if (loop == 0) {
00340          printf("cam24i_sa: status:0x%x\n", (INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7));
00341          return;
00342       }
00343       *((char *) (*d)) = (unsigned char) INP(RL);
00344       *((char *) (*d) + 1) = (unsigned char) INP(RM);
00345       *((char *) (*d) + 2) = (unsigned char) INP(RH);
00346       *((char *) (*d) + 3) = 0;
00347       (*d)++;
00348       aa++;
00349    }
00350 }

00383 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00384 INLINE void camo(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, WORD d)
00385 {
00386    WORD loop = 1000;
00387 
00388    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00389    OUTP(STA, n);
00390    OUTP(ADD, a);
00391    OUTP(FUN, f);
00392    OUTP(WL, (unsigned char) (d));
00393    OUTP(WM, *(((unsigned char *) &d) + 1));
00394    OUTP(CACY, 1);
00395    while (((INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7) != 5) && loop > 0)
00396       loop--;
00397    if (loop == 0)
00398       printf("cami: status:0x%x\n", (INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7));
00399 }
00400

00404    camo(c, n, a, f, d);
00405 }

00407 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00408 INLINE void cam24o(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, DWORD d)
00409 {
00410    WORD loop = 1000;
00411 
00412    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00413    OUTP(STA, n);
00414    OUTP(ADD, a);
00415    OUTP(FUN, f);
00416    OUTP(WL, (unsigned char) (d));
00417    OUTP(WM, *(((unsigned char *) &d) + 1));
00418    OUTP(WH, *(((unsigned char *) &d) + 2));
00419    OUTP(CACY, 1);
00420    while (((INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7) != 5) && loop > 0)
00421       loop--;
00422    if (loop == 0)
00423       printf("cami: status:0x%x\n", (INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7));
00424 }

00427 INLINE void cam16o_q(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00428                      WORD d, int *x, int *q)
00429 {
00430    WORD loop = 1000;
00431 
00432    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00433    OUTP(STA, n);
00434    OUTP(ADD, a);
00435    OUTP(FUN, f);
00436    OUTP(WL, (unsigned char) (d));
00437    OUTP(WM, *(((unsigned char *) &d) + 1));
00438    OUTP(CACY, 1);
00439    while (((INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7) != 5) && loop > 0)
00440       loop--;
00441    if (loop == 0)
00442       printf("cami: status:0x%x\n", (INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7));

00445 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00446 INLINE void cam24o_q(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00447                      DWORD d, int *x, int *q)
00448 {
00449    WORD loop = 1000;
00450 
00451    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00452    OUTP(STA, n);
00453    OUTP(ADD, a);
00454    OUTP(FUN, f);
00455    OUTP(WL, (unsigned char) (d));
00456    OUTP(WM, *(((unsigned char *) &d) + 1));
00457    OUTP(WH, *(((unsigned char *) &d) + 2));
00458    OUTP(CACY, 1);
00459    while (((INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7) != 5) && loop > 0)
00460       loop--;
00461    if (loop == 0)
00462       printf("cami: status:0x%x\n", (INT) ((INP(OPST)) & 0x7));
00463    *q = INP(LXQ);
00464    *x = *q >> 1 & 1;
00465    *q &= 1;
00466 }

00474 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00475 INLINE void cam16o_r(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00476                      WORD * d, const int r)
00477 {
00478    WORD i;
00479 
00480    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00481    OUTP(STA, n);
00482    OUTP(ADD, a);
00483    OUTP(FUN, f);
00484    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00485       OUTP(WL, *((unsigned char *) d));
00486       OUTP(WM, *(((unsigned char *) d) + 1));
00487       OUTP(CACY, 1);
00488       d++;
00489    }
00490 }
00491 
00492 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00493 INLINE void cam24o_r(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f,
00494                      DWORD * d, const int r)
00495 {
00496    WORD i;
00497 
00498    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00499    OUTP(STA, n);
00500    OUTP(ADD, a);
00501    OUTP(FUN, f);
00502    for (i = 0; i < r; i++) {
00503       OUTP(WL, *((unsigned char *) d));
00504       OUTP(WM, *(((unsigned char *) d) + 1));
00505       OUTP(WH, *(((unsigned char *) d) + 2));
00506       OUTP(CACY, 1);
00507       d++;
00508    }
00509 }
00510 
00511 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00512 INLINE int camc_chk(const int c)
00513 {
00514    unsigned int n, a, f;
00515 
00516    /* check if crate controller is online */
00517    a = INP(CDMA);
00518    if ((a & 0x4) == 0)
00519       return -1;
00520 
00521    /* clear inhibit */
00522    camc(c, 1, 2, 32);
00523 
00524    /* read back naf */
00525    a = (unsigned char) INP(ADD);
00526    f = (unsigned char) INP(FUN);
00527    n = (unsigned char) INP(STA);
00528 
00529    if (n != 1 || a != 2 || f != 32)
00530       return -1;
00531 
00532    return 0;
00533 }
00534 
00535 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00536 INLINE void camc(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f)
00537 {
00538    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00539    OUTP(STA, n);
00540    OUTP(ADD, a);
00541    OUTP(FUN, f);
00542    OUTP(CACY, 1);
00543 }
00544 
00545 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00546 INLINE void camc_q(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, int *q)
00547 {
00548    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00549    OUTP(STA, n);
00550    OUTP(ADD, a);
00551    OUTP(FUN, f);
00552    OUTP(CACY, 1);
00553    *q = INP(LXQ);
00554    *q &= 1;
00555 }
00556 
00557 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00558 INLINE void camc_sa(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, const int r)
00559 {
00560    int i;
00561 
00562    for (i = 0; i < r; i++)
00563       camc(c, n, a + i, f);
00564 }
00565 
00566 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00567 INLINE void camc_sn(const int c, const int n, const int a, const int f, const int r)
00568 {
00569    int i;
00570 
00571    for (i = 0; i < r; i++)
00572       camc(c, n + i, a, f);
00573 }

00575 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00576 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00577 static HANDLE _hdio = 0;
00578 #endif
00579 
00580 INLINE int cam_init(void)
00581 {
00582 
00583 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00584    OSVERSIONINFO vi;
00585    DWORD buffer[] = { 6, CAMAC_BASE, CAMAC_BASE + 4 * 0x10, 0 };
00586    DWORD size;
00587 
00588    vi.dwOSVersionInfoSize = sizeof(OSVERSIONINFO);
00589    GetVersionEx(&vi);
00590 
00591    /* use DirectIO driver under NT to gain port access */
00592    if (vi.dwPlatformId == VER_PLATFORM_WIN32_NT) {
00593       _hdio = CreateFile("\\\\.\\directio", GENERIC_READ, FILE_SHARE_READ, NULL,
00594                          OPEN_EXISTING, 0, NULL);
00595       if (_hdio == INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00596          return -1;
00597    }
00598 
00599    if (!DeviceIoControl(_hdio, (DWORD) 0x9c406000, &buffer, sizeof(buffer),
00600                         NULL, 0, &size, NULL))
00601       return -1;
00602 #endif                          // _MSC_VER
00603 #ifdef OS_LINUX
00604    /* 
00605       In order to access the IO ports of the CAMAC interface, one needs
00606       to call the ioperm() function for those ports. This requires root
00607       privileges. For normal operation, this is performed by the "dio"
00608       program, which is a "setuid" program having temporarily root privi-
00609       lege. So the frontend is started with "dio frontend". Since the
00610       frontend cannot be debugged through the dio program, we suplly here
00611       the direct ioperm call which requires the program to be run as root,
00612       making it possible to debug it. The program has then to be compiled
00613       with "gcc -DDO_IOPERM -o frontend frontend.c dsp004.c ..."
00614     */
00615 
00616 #ifdef DO_IOPERM
00617    ioperm(0x80, 1, 1);
00618    if (ioperm(CAMAC_BASE, 4 * 0x10, 1) < 0)
00619       printf("hyt1331.c: Cannot call ioperm() (no root privileges)\n");
00620 #endif
00621 
00622 #endif
00623    OUTP(ZCI, (1 << 6));
00624    OUTP(CACY, 1);
00625    return SUCCESS;
00626 }
00627 
00628 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00629 INLINE void cam_exit(void)
00630 {
00631 #ifdef _MSC_VER
00632    DWORD buffer[] = { 6, CAMAC_BASE, CAMAC_BASE + 4 * 0x10, 0 };
00633    DWORD size;
00634 
00635    if (_hdio <= 0)
00636       return;
00637 
00638    DeviceIoControl(_hdio, (DWORD) 0x9c406000, &buffer, sizeof(buffer),
00639                    NULL, 0, &size, NULL);
00640 #endif
00641 }
00642 
00643 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00644 INLINE void cam_inhibit_set(const int c)
00645 {
00646    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00647    OUTP(ZCI, 0x4);
00648    OUTP(CACY, 1);
00649 }
00650 
00651 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00652 INLINE int cam_inhibit_test(const int c)
00653 {
00654    return 0;
00655 }
00656 
00657 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00658 INLINE void cam_inhibit_clear(const int c)
00659 {
00660    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00661    OUTP(ZCI, 0x0);
00662    OUTP(CACY, 1);
00663 }
00664 
00665 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00666 INLINE void cam_crate_clear(const int c)
00667 {
00668    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00669    OUTP(ZCI, 0x2);
00670    OUTP(CACY, 1);
00671 }
00672 
00673 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00674 INLINE void cam_crate_zinit(const int c)
00675 {
00676    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00677    OUTP(ZCI, 0x1);
00678    OUTP(CACY, 1);
00679 }
00680 
00681 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00682 INLINE void cam_lam_enable(const int c, const int n)
00683 {
00684    /* enable LAM flip-flop in unit */
00685    camc(c, n, 0, 26);
00686 
00687    /* clear LAM flip-flop in unit */
00688    camc(c, n, 0, 10);
00689 }
00690 
00691 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00692 INLINE void cam_lam_disable(const int c, const int n)
00693 {
00694 
00695 /* enable LAM flip-flop in unit */
00696    camc(c, n, 0, 24);
00697 }
00698 
00699 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00700 INLINE void cam_lam_read(const int c, DWORD * lam)
00701 {
00702    OUTP(CDMA, (((c & 0x3) - 1) << 4));
00703    *lam = INP(LXQ);
00704    *lam = (*lam >> 2) & 0x1f;
00705    *lam = 1 << (*lam - 1);
00706 }
00707 
00708 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00709 INLINE void cam_lam_clear(const int c, const int n)
00710 {
00711    camc(c, n, 0, 9);
00712 }
